# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a `String.Comparator` that represents the same comparison as the given `String.StandardComparator`.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ standardComparison: String.StandardComparator)
```

## Parameters

- **standardComparison**: The `String.StandardComparator` to convert.
title: init(_:)
